<!-- Code generated from the comments of the Config struct in datasource/tss/data.go; DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY -->

- `secret_fields` ([]string) - Names of the Secret Fields to extract from the Secret ID.
  If empty, all fields will be retrieved.
  You can also use `exclude_fields` to omit some fields from the output.

- `exclude_fields` ([]string) - Names of the Secret Fields to exclude when extracting fields.
  The fields provided in this variable will not be returned to Packer,
  even when they are explicitly defined in `secret_fields`.

<!-- End of code generated from the comments of the Config struct in datasource/tss/data.go; -->
